key_risks: Securities class action lawsuit alleging misleading IPO information
Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on third-party manufacturers
Dependence on direct-to-consumer model and rising digital marketing costs
Ethical sourcing and labor practices scrutiny
Uncertainty around the impact of the $50 million share buyback program
controversies: Ethical sourcing and labor practices concerns
environmental_issues: Reliance on air freight contributing to environmental impact
social_issues: Labor practices and ethical sourcing in the supply chain
governance_issues: Securities class action lawsuit and potential governance missteps
